The Loyalty Card

What do you get?

  • Free entry to The Shed for 1 year (not including Boxing Night and New Years eve)
  • Personal invite to Loyalty nights in both venues throughout the year with buy one get one free drink promotions. (incl. Premium Brands)
  • First offers on Special Function tickets. (at a reduced price)
Cost - £30 each or buy 2 for £50
***Please note we have the right to refuse entry***

How to get one?

  • Purchase a loyalty card on Saturday nights
  • Contact us using the Contact form
